action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds (for himself and Ms. Wasserman Schultz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to include algal blooms in the definition of a major disaster, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Harmful Algal Bloom Disaster Relief Act.
Section 102(2) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5122) is amended by striking or drought and inserting drought, or algal blooms.
